name: Crown CWT
description: "We are a leading entertainment company in Thailand focusing on producing animated movies and series. We've been successfully launching animated series called ""Shelldon"" which has been distributed over 180 countries. Recently, we haved launched an animated series called ""FriendZSpace"" in Australia and we are planning to launch it in Europe, USA, and Asia as well. Our tokenholders will have a right to vote for a content/direction of the movie that we are going to produce ie. the story concept or character art concept. Moreover, the holders will have a chance to get free NFT airdrop for each particular movie project and later we will randomly selected the NFT holders and tokenholders (snapshot and ramdomly pick for NFT holders, staking the token and ramdomly pick one winner similar to lotto for tokenholders) to earn a right to appear as a support character in the movie project."
